doc:
Tobey Maguire https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tobey_Maguire 0 Tobias Vincent Maguire (born June 27, 1975) is an American actor and film producer. He gained recognition for his role as Peter Parker / Spider-Man in Sam Raimi's Spider-Man trilogy. His other major films include Pleasantville (1998), The Cider House Rules (1999), Wonder Boys (2000), Seabiscuit (2003), The Good German (2006), Brothers (2009), and The Great Gatsby (2013). He was nominated for the Screen Actors Guild and Golden Globe Awards, and received two Saturn Awards, including one for Best Actor. He established his own production company in 2012 called Material Pictures, and co-produced Good People that same year. In 2014, he produced and starred as Bobby Fischer in Pawn Sacrifice. Tobias_Vincent_Maguire ( born June_27_,_1975 ) is an_American_actor_and_film_producer . He gained recognition for his_role as Peter_Parker / Spider-Man in Sam_Raimi 's_Spider-Man_trilogy . His_other_major_films include Pleasantville_(_1998_) , The_Cider_House_Rules_(_1999_) , Wonder_Boys ( 2000_) , Seabiscuit_(_2003_) , The_Good_German_(_2006_) , Brothers_(_2009_) , and The_Great_Gatsby_(_2013_) . He was_nominated for the_Screen_Actors_Guild and Golden_Globe_Awards , and received two_Saturn_Awards , including one_for_Best_Actor . He established his_own_production_company in 2012 called Material_Pictures , and co-produced Good_People that_same_year . In 2014 , he produced and starred as Bobby_Fischer in Pawn_Sacrifice .
